title: Styx.Masters.of.Shadows.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Styx.Masters.of.Shadows.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release info:  

Release year : 2014
Genre : Action / RPG
Developer : Cyanide Studio
Publisher : Focus Home Interactive
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language:   Rus | Eng
Voice language:  Eng
Crack: RELOADED




System requirements:  

Operating System : Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor : Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz or equivalent AMD
Memory : 3 GB
Video card : 1 GB, compatible with DirectX 9, Shader Model 4 th
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 7 GB


Game information:  


Styx - Goblin, who two years ... The first of the Goblins.
In a forgotten Tower Akenasha where humans and elves protect
the World Tree, hidden secret of its origin and the creation
of the Goblin race. While Amber magic comes from the World Tree,
and Elves and Humans are mired in political wars, from the Styx
is a chance to learn about their origins ... And at the same
time earn some money.

Wade through a huge tower Akenasha, performing various tasks
(murder, information extraction, and so on. Etc..) And uncovering
the dark secrets of her origin. Staying in the shadows, kill enemies
in melee or adapts "accidents". RPG-mechanics allow you to open a new,
powerful skills, impressive special techniques and new equipment. Amber
gave you such spectacular powers like invisibility, "amber eyes" and the
ability to clone himself. Explore the levels to get all the information
about his past, steal treasures and improve equipment. Use the shadows
to reveal the truth ...


Game Features:  


Nonlinear job with organic search path.

The emphasis on stealth and infiltration: sneaking in the shadows
in search of hidden treasures.

Develop six unique and powerful branches in the tree of skills.

Distract, solve, soul stealing using clone created from your same body.

Tangled full of plot twists and discoveries.


RePack Features:  

Styx: Master of Shadows
Do not cut / recoded
